data.eml:eml: Caetitus gen. nov.: a new genus of Neotropical Copiphorini (Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae: Copiphorini) to include C. porteri (Bolivar, 1903)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Antunes, André Fonseca, Takiya, Daniela Maeda, Chamorro-Rengifo, Juliana (2018): Caetitus gen. nov.: a new genus of Neotropical Copiphorini (Tettigoniidae: Conocephalinae: Copiphorini) to include C. porteri (Bolivar, 1903). Zootaxa 4375 (4): 578-586, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4375.4.7
